title: More Than Friends
overview: Due to a misunderstanding, Lee Soo and Kyung Woo Yun have held a crush on each other for over 10 years.Lee Soo works as a photographer and he is attractive. Kyung Woo Yun works as a calligrapher. She has had a crush on Lee Soo for the past 10 years, since she was 18 years old.
